name: XHYPE
description: The aim of the project is to give the users the chance to earn rewards by holding the XHP native token, just by the fact of own XHP you'll be earning USDT directly on your web3 wallet. There is also a huge marketplace where all tx will be 100% DEFI, you'll be able to buy experiencies such as netflix accounts, holiday trips, flights, football tickets... and thoose things will be directly purchased with your metamask or web3 wallet!
